name: CAO - BX3 - Toro
additionalNotes: If you’re looking for a hearty, heady, and bold smoking experience you can only get from Brazilian tobacco, then you just hit the trifecta with the CAO BX3. In fact, its name is “BX3” is an abbreviation for “Brazilian times 3.” This full-bodied yet flavorful cigar is blended with Brazilian tobacco from filler to wrapper. Its filler consists of Brazilian Mata Fina, Nicaraguan, Honduran and Mexican tobaccos. This multi-national blend is held by a Brazilian Arapiraca binder, which is covered by an oily, dark Brazilian Mata Fina wrapper.
